mapper.select: SELECT qs.fUuid AS 'uuid', qs.fDomain AS 'domain', qs.fPcGroup AS 'pcGroup', qs.fPhoneGroup AS 'phoneGroup', qs.fCreateTime AS 'createTime' FROM t_qz_setting qs WHERE qs.fCrawlerStatus='new' OR qs.fCrawlerTime IS NULL OR(fCrawlerStatus = 'finish' AND DATE_ADD(fCrawlerTime,INTERVAL #{crawlerHour} HOUR) <= NOW()) OR DATE_ADD(fCrawlerTime,INTERVAL #{crawlerHour} HOUR) <= NOW() ORDER BY qs.fCreateTime DESC limit #{taskNumber}
SELECT fUuid AS 'uuid', fTerminalType AS 'terminalType', fQZSettingUuid AS 'qzSettingUuid' FROM t_qz_keyword_rank_info

SELECT COUNT(qk.fIncrease <= #{lower} OR NULL) AS downNum, COUNT(qk.fIncrease >= #{upper} OR NULL) AS upNum, COUNT(qk.fAchieveLevel > 1 OR (qk.fAchieveLevel = 1 AND qk.fDifferenceValue = 2) OR NULL) AS atLeastStandardNum, COUNT((qk.fAchieveLevel = 1 AND qk.fDifferenceValue <> 2) OR NULL) AS neverStandardNum, COUNT(qk.fDifferenceValue <= #{differenceValue} OR NULL) AS closeStandardNum FROM t_qz_keyword_rank_info qk JOIN t_qz_setting qs ON qs.fUuid = qk.fQZSettingUuid JOIN t_customer c ON c.fUuid = qs.fCustomerUuid WHERE 1=1
AND qk.fTerminalType = #{terminalType}
